text:
Rideways | Manchester, UK | Onsite | https://www.rideways.com/

Rideways is hiring Java Developers, Senior Java Developers and a UX to work at our office in central Manchester. We're using Java 8, Spring MVC, Angular, Camel and AWS to make it easier to book a taxi from the airport to your hotel or conference centre.

We are looking for enthusiastic developers, keen on working in an agile team.

If you are interested, please email me on arthurembleton@rideways.com
